name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing and deploying robust applications for the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Python** with additional skills in **GoLang**, and adept in cloud services including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Experienced in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and using **Git** in an **Agile** environment.
Demonstrated expertise in building RESTful APIs and managing **Data Structures** and **Algorithms** for optimized performance. Proven ability in **Async Programming** and **Networking** to enhance system functionality and scalability. Highly skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in frontend and backend frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Strong background in developing AI/ML platforms supporting predictive analytics using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, while ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.

• Delivered mobile applications for iOS and Android using **Flutter** and **React Native**, implementing state management with **Provider** and **Redux** to enhance user experience.
• Created CI/CD pipelines for mobile apps with **Fastlane** and **App Center**, integrating test automation and crash analytics using **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**.
• Led the transformation of legacy systems into microservices using **Docker** and **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)** for scalable deployments and improved fault tolerance.
• Built and maintained data infrastructure using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **GraphQL** to support rapid data ingestion and real-time analytics.
• Deployed machine learning models using **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**, ensuring seamless integration into live systems.
• Implemented MLOps workflows employing **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow** to streamline model training and deployment processes and improve collaboration.
• Integrated intelligent features into applications, leveraging models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS SageMaker** for personalized user experiences.
• Developed advanced data visualization tools with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing real-time analysis of operational metrics and trends.

• Leveraged **Python** and **GoLang** for developing robust backend services within a microservices architecture enhancing system performance for high-volume financial transactions.  
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Git** and **AWS/Azure** environments, increasing deployment efficiency by **50%** while maintaining Agile development practices.  
• Designed resilient RESTful APIs to facilitate data exchange between services, ensuring seamless integration and communication across platforms by utilizing **Async Programming** strategies.  
• Utilized **Linux** operating environment for deploying applications in production, optimizing systems for network performance and reliability.  
• Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.  
• Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.  
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.  
• Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.  
• Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing.  
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.  
• Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.

Leveraged **Python** and **GoLang** for backend service development, ensuring optimization and scalability within an event-driven architecture while adhering to **Agile** methodologies.
Implemented and maintained **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** cloud services for deploying resilient and high-performance applications with a focus on CI/CD practices to ensure efficient software delivery and integration.
Designed RESTful APIs to establish robust communication between services, utilizing **Data Structures** and **Algorithms** to enhance processing speed and efficiency across microservices.
Employed **Linux** environments to enable proficient system performance and security, maintaining up-to-date service environments on a **9**-server cluster.
Utilized **Git** for version control, managing code changes across **15** active project branches and enabling seamless collaboration within the development team.
Applied **Async Programming** techniques to improve application throughput and responsiveness, successfully reducing the latency of key processes by over **25%**.
Executed thorough networking strategies to enhance application connectivity, optimizing the flow of data and service interactions across the platform, supporting user demand spikes.
Led feature development cycles in line with Agile sprints, encompassing regular code reviews and integration of best practices, resulting in a **30%** increase in team productivity.
Enhanced system monitoring and logging protocols, leveraging advanced **CI/CD** tools to swiftly identify and respond to service-related issues, achieving **99.9%** uptime across all platform services.
